query.result:
| Italian | Derived | Etymology | |---|---|---| | perché | Latin | *per* + *quod* | | si | Latin | *sic* | | fare | Latin | *facere* | | montare | Latin | *montare* | | più | Latin | *plus* | | sincero | Latin | *sincerus* |
**Note:** The etymology of the word "sincero" is uncertain, but it is thought to be derived from the Latin word "sincerus", which means "pure" or "unmixed".
